Ri4 ben3 Yuan2 zi3 Neng2 Yan2 jiu1 suo3

definition: erhua variant of 小日本[xiao3 Ri4 ben3]
(bird species of China) Matsudaira's storm petrel (Oceanodroma matsudairae)
pinyin: Ri4 ben3 cha1 wei3 hai3 yan4

definition: A Record of Japan, by Huang Zunxian 黃遵憲|黄遵宪[Huang2 Zun1 xian4], an extended analysis of Meiji Japan
NHK (Nihon Hōsō Kyōkai), Japanese national broadcasting company
pinyin: Ri4 ben3 Fang4 song4 Xie2 hui4

definition: Nihonshoki or Chronicles of Japan (c. 720) book of mythology and history

sentences.english: All images by Koichi Mitsui Koichi Mitsui is a professional photographer in Japan. When he's not on the job shooting for magazines and ads, he wanders around Tokyo taking pictures with his iPhone 3GS.
sentences.chinese: 三井光一是日本一位专业摄影师。

sentences.english: Most of the global companies are moving manufacturing facilities out-side of Japan.
sentences.chinese: 大多数跨国公司都在把生产设备迁出日本。

sentences.english: And the Volt is made in America while the Prius comes from Japan.
sentences.chinese: 此外，Volt是美国制造，而普锐斯来自日本。

sentences.english: I strongly believe that Japanese high school girls are the sexiest female living creature in this world.
sentences.chinese: 我深信日本女子高生是世上最性感的雌性生物。

sentences.english: After the Russo-Japanese War, Japan's occupation of southern Sakhalin in Russia.
sentences.chinese: 日俄战争后，日本占领俄国库页岛南部。

sentences.english: Japan is hosting the meeting of delegates from the so-called G8, or group of eight industrialized nations.
sentences.chinese: 日本主持了八国集团代表会议。

sentences.english: The languages were severely suppressed in education by the Japanese government.
sentences.chinese: 日本政府严格限制了琉球语在学校的教学和使用。

sentences.english: Britain has fallen behind Japan in shipbuilding.
sentences.chinese: 在造船方面英国已落到日本后头了。

sentences.english: The wedding will be held at Fuji Mount in Japan.
sentences.chinese: 婚礼将会在日本富士山举行。

sentences.english: Gardens in Japan, though of Chinese parentage, have more conventions and less complexity in lay-out than the Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 日本园林，虽然源于中国，布局的习俗化大于复杂化。

sentences.english: I will start from their own, the Japanese learn their advantages.
sentences.chinese: 我也会从个人做起，向日本人学习他们的优点。

sentences.english: Is Japan Planning to Create an Anti-China"Asian NATO"?
sentences.chinese: 日本打算建立一个反中国的“亚洲北约”吗？

sentences.english: Thank you for calling Japan Airlines.
sentences.chinese: 感谢您打电话来日本航空公司。

sentences.english: Still, Japan quickly suspended imports of American long-grain rice.
sentences.chinese: 日本立即做出反应，暂缓对美国长粒大米的进口。

sentences.english: Of course, such data did not appear in “This is Japan”.
sentences.chinese: 当然，这些数据并没有在《这就是日本》上面登载。

definition: South Korea (Republic of Korea)/Han, one of the Seven Hero States of the Warring States 戰國七雄|战国七雄[zhan4 guo2 qi1 xiong2]/Korea from the fall of the Joseon dynasty in 1897
Ōsaka, a city and prefecture in Japan
Tokyo, capital of Japan/Tonkin (northern Vietnam during the French colonial period)
Kōbe, major Japanese port near Ōsaka
island nation (sometimes refers specifically to Japan)
North Korea/Korea as geographic term/Taiwan pr. [Chao2 xian1]
